title: I'm in Love with the Villainess (Light Novel) Vol. 1
description: In this hilarious romantic comedy, a reincarnated gamer pursues her villainous lady love at a fantasy girl's academy!Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favorite otome game, Revolution. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favorite character, Claire Francois–the main antagonist of the story! Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
author: Inori
